item.title: HTTP/1.0 From Scratch
item.description: In our previous exploration, we delved into the simplicity of HTTP/0.9, a protocol that served as the web’s initial foundation. However, as the internet evolved, so did its needs. Enter HTTP/1.0, a landmark version released in 1996 that laid the groundwork for the web we know today. HTTP/1.
